org.yamcs.client

Class ProcessorControlClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.client.ProcessorControlClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ConnectionListener, WebSocketClientCallback, WebSocketResponseHandler

    public class ProcessorControlClient
extends Object
implements ConnectionListener, WebSocketClientCallback, WebSocketResponseHandler
    controls processors in yamcs server via websocket

      • connected

        public void connected(String url)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectionListener
        Called after a successful connection to the yamcs server has been established.

        Note: when using a re-connecting YamcsConnector, this method is also called after a successful re-connection attempt.

        Specified by:
        connected in interface ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the yamcs server
